title: Beautiful Creatures
description: Is falling in love the beginning... or the end?In Ethan Wate's hometown there lies the darkest of secrets...There is a girl.Slow, she pulled the hood from her head. Green eyes, black hair. Lena Duchannes.There is a curse.On the Sixteenth year, the Sixteenth Year, the Book will take what it's been promised. And no one can stop it.In the end, there is a grave.Lena and Ethan become bound together by a deep, powerful love. But Lena is cursed and on her sixteenth birthday her fate will be decided.
author: Kami Garcia
